snippet.title: Spirittea Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1931010/Spirittea/

Sign up for the BETA: https://bit.ly/SpiritteaBeta

Hey human, we've got problems! This town is crawling with troublesome spirits, and you're the only one who can see them. You'd better get that old bathhouse up and running, maybe that'll help them chill out!

Join the official Discord: https://discord.gg/spirittea
